scenes.description: Shiori interacts with her imaginary friends Fuwawa and Mococo in a whimsical skit before being prompted to perform a song to unlock a book.
Shiori performs the song 'Abnormality Dancing Girl'.

subtitles.original: Alright!
subtitles.english: Alright!

subtitles.original: Now that we have that apple pie,
subtitles.english: Now that we have that apple pie,

subtitles.original: what now?
subtitles.english: what now?

subtitles.original: Shiori put the pie on the table.
subtitles.english: Shiori put the pie on the table.

subtitles.original: Then she thought it would be nice to pour tofu milk for her friends too.
subtitles.english: Then she thought it would be nice to pour tofu milk for her friends too.

subtitles.original: I don't have tofu milk.
subtitles.english: I don't have tofu milk.

subtitles.original: What? Are you sure?
subtitles.english: What? Are you sure?

subtitles.original: I'm very sure that I don't have tofu milk.
subtitles.english: I'm very sure that I don't have tofu milk.

subtitles.original: Maybe we could just pretend?
subtitles.english: Maybe we could just pretend?

subtitles.original: Alright.
subtitles.english: Alright.

subtitles.original: That's a good idea!
subtitles.english: That's a good idea!

subtitles.original: Ah...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: It turns out imaginary milk is pretty good.
subtitles.english: It turns out imaginary milk is pretty good.

subtitles.original: Ah, give it here! I want it for my imaginary coffee.
subtitles.english: Ah, give it here! I want it for my imaginary coffee.

subtitles.original: Oh, I'll trade you for a slice of the apple pie.
subtitles.english: Oh, I'll trade you for a slice of the apple pie.

subtitles.original: Deal! Shiori, can you give Mococo some pie?
subtitles.english: Deal! Shiori, can you give Mococo some pie?

subtitles.original: How am I going to give my imaginary friends my imaginary pie?
subtitles.english: How am I going to give my imaginary friends my imaginary pie?

subtitles.original: But you know what? I think a better question would be,
subtitles.english: But you know what? I think a better question would be,

subtitles.original: what do I do with this?
subtitles.english: what do I do with this?

subtitles.original: Cool! Maybe you're supposed to wield it as your sword?
subtitles.english: Cool! Maybe you're supposed to wield it as your sword?

subtitles.original: Like this?
subtitles.english: Like this?

subtitles.original: It does come with a plus three to attack.
subtitles.english: It does come with a plus three to attack.

subtitles.original: Seriously, where are you seeing these numbers?
subtitles.english: Seriously, where are you seeing these numbers?

subtitles.original: Moco-chan, why would a microphone be her weapon?
subtitles.english: Moco-chan, why would a microphone be her weapon?

subtitles.original: Huh? I don't know, but if she's an adventurer, she's gonna need a sword, okay?
subtitles.english: Huh? I don't know, but if she's an adventurer, she's gonna need a sword, okay?

subtitles.original: Like with the power of music?
subtitles.english: Like with the power of music?

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: But she's not an adventurer in the script.
subtitles.english: But she's not an adventurer in the script.

subtitles.original: Well, maybe I want to add my own parts to this script, huh?
subtitles.english: Well, maybe I want to add my own parts to this script, huh?

subtitles.original: Is that really so wrong?
subtitles.english: Is that really so wrong?

subtitles.original: Come on, she wants to go home.
subtitles.english: Come on, she wants to go home.

subtitles.original: Don't worry, Shiori, I can help you with that.
subtitles.english: Don't worry, Shiori, I can help you with that.

subtitles.original: Why don't you go back to the bookshelf?
subtitles.english: Why don't you go back to the bookshelf?

subtitles.original: At least one person's useful here.
subtitles.english: At least one person's useful here.

subtitles.original: Don't worry, Shiori, this is almost over, I promise.
subtitles.english: Don't worry, Shiori, this is almost over, I promise.

subtitles.original: But first, you need to unlock the Book of Memories.
subtitles.english: But first, you need to unlock the Book of Memories.

subtitles.original: Do you remember ever getting lulled to sleep by a lullaby when you were a child?
subtitles.english: Do you remember ever getting lulled to sleep by a lullaby when you were a child?

subtitles.original: Of course not. I had no childhood.
subtitles.english: Of course not. I had no childhood.

subtitles.original: Oh, well...
subtitles.english: Oh, well...

subtitles.original: To unlock the powers of the final book, you need to take the microphone and sing the Nyakuza to sleep.
subtitles.english: To unlock the powers of the final book, you need to take the microphone and sing the Nyakuza to sleep.

subtitles.original: You've got this, okay?
subtitles.english: You've got this, okay?

subtitles.original: Alright. I'll do my best.
subtitles.english: Alright. I'll do my best.

subtitles.original: Nerissa Ravencroft / - Advent -
subtitles.english: Nerissa Ravencroft / - Advent -

subtitles.original: アブノーマリティ・ダンシンガール / Lyrics・Music: ぐりり
subtitles.english: Abnormality Dancing Girl / Lyrics・Music: Guriri

subtitles.original: いつもどう頑張って
subtitles.english: No matter how hard I always try,

subtitles.original: 努力をしたとこで
subtitles.english: no matter how much effort I put in,

subtitles.original: 指し示されるは平均値
subtitles.english: all that's shown is the average value.

subtitles.original: やってられないよ
subtitles.english: I can't take it anymore.

subtitles.original: くだらない評価に
subtitles.english: By these worthless evaluations,

subtitles.original: 踊らされてばかり
subtitles.english: I'm just being toyed with.

subtitles.original: もう嫌になっちゃったこの人生
subtitles.english: I've grown to hate this life.

subtitles.original: なら生まれ変わろうか
subtitles.english: So, shall I be reborn?

subtitles.original: 「異常」が胸を埋め尽くして
subtitles.english: "Abnormality" fills my chest completely,

subtitles.original: 普通じゃない自分になるの
subtitles.english: and I become someone who's not ordinary.

subtitles.original: 自問自答繰り返し手に入れたの
subtitles.english: Repeating self-questioning, I've obtained

subtitles.original: 新しいワタシを
subtitles.english: a brand new me.

subtitles.original: ほら見てよ
subtitles.english: Look here,

subtitles.original: ほら触れたよ
subtitles.english: look, I've touched it.

subtitles.original: 凡庸な服を脱ぎ捨て去って
subtitles.english: Throwing away these mediocre clothes,

subtitles.original: 今サナギから蝶になるの
subtitles.english: I'm now turning from a chrysalis into a butterfly.

subtitles.original: ありのまま全て見せつけて
subtitles.english: Showing off everything just as it is,

subtitles.original: 冷めきった舞台 演者はいない
subtitles.english: on this chilled stage where there are no performers.

subtitles.original: ならステップ刻んで One Two Three
subtitles.english: Then carving out steps, one, two, three.

subtitles.original: 踊らされるんじゃない 踊るのよ
subtitles.english: I'm not being toyed with, I'm dancing.

subtitles.original: さあ さあ さあ 狂って
subtitles.english: Now, now, now, go crazy!

subtitles.original: 狂って
subtitles.english: Go crazy!

subtitles.original: 「普通」が呪いをかけてきて
subtitles.english: "Ordinary" casts a curse on me,

subtitles.original: 「異常」に憧れたの
subtitles.english: and I longed for "abnormality".

subtitles.original: 異論 持論に興味などないから
subtitles.english: Since I have no interest in objections or personal opinions,

subtitles.original: もう鍵をかけて
subtitles.english: lock it up already.

subtitles.original: 「好き」「嫌い」を通り越して
subtitles.english: Going beyond "like" and "dislike",

subtitles.original: 「異常」に恋焦がれていたの
subtitles.english: I was yearning for "abnormality".

subtitles.original: 歪んだ愛の成れの果て創られた
subtitles.english: Created as the end result of a distorted love,

subtitles.original: 新しいワタシを
subtitles.english: a brand new me.

subtitles.original: ほら見てよ
subtitles.english: Look here,

subtitles.original: ほら触れたよ
subtitles.english: look, I've touched it.

subtitles.original: 凡庸な服を脱ぎ捨て去って
subtitles.english: Throwing away these mediocre clothes,

subtitles.original: 今サナギから蝶になるの
subtitles.english: I'm now turning from a chrysalis into a butterfly.

subtitles.original: ありのまま全て見せつけて
subtitles.english: Showing off everything just as it is,

subtitles.original: 冷めきった舞台 演者はいない
subtitles.english: on this chilled stage where there are no performers.

subtitles.original: ならステップ刻んで One Two Three
subtitles.english: Then carving out steps, one, two, three.

subtitles.original: 踊らされるんじゃない 踊るのよ
subtitles.english: I'm not being toyed with, I'm dancing.

subtitles.original: さあ さあ さあ 狂って
subtitles.english: Now, now, now, go crazy!

subtitles.original: 狂って
subtitles.english: Go crazy!

subtitles.original: 暗い部屋
subtitles.english: A dark room.

subtitles.original: 1人きり
subtitles.english: All alone.

subtitles.original: 鏡の前
subtitles.english: In front of the mirror.

subtitles.original: 午前0時
「アナタ誰」
subtitles.english: "Who are you?"

subtitles.original: 「ワタシ誰」
subtitles.english: "Who am I?"

subtitles.original: 問い掛けど返事は無かった
subtitles.english: I asked, but there was no reply.

subtitles.original: 狂え
subtitles.english: Go crazy.
